title: Replace quiz-page corner sticker with a teddy bear cartoon sticker

requirements.text: Add a new teddy-bear-style cartoony sticker image as a static asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` using a sanitized filename (lowercase, hyphen-separated, no spaces/special characters), and ensure it is directly loadable via `/assets/generated/<filename>`.

quotes: can you add a teddy bear carttony sticker instead of the one i send

acceptanceCriteria: A new teddy bear cartoon sticker image file exists under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with a sanitized filename.
Requesting `GET /assets/generated/<sanitized-filename>` in the browser loads the image (no 404).

requirements.text: Update `frontend/src/components/sections/QuizSection.tsx` to replace the current corner-sticker `` `src` (`/assets/generated/kawaii-valentines-stickers.dim_220x220.png`) with the new teddy-bear sticker asset path, in BOTH the quiz question card view and the quiz results card view, keeping the existing placement/responsive sizing/rotation and ensuring it does not block text or buttons.

quotes: can you add a teddy bear carttony sticker instead of the one i send

acceptanceCriteria: In `QuizSection.tsx`, both sticker `` instances (question card and results card) use the exact same new teddy-bear sticker `/assets/generated/...` path.
The sticker renders visibly on the quiz question card and on the quiz results card.
The sticker overlay does not cover the question text or answer buttons at common breakpoints (mobile and desktop).

constraints: Do not edit any files under the immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Serve images only as static assets from `frontend/public/assets/generated/` (do not serve images via the backend).
Keep existing quiz behavior (questions, scoring, celebration animation, transitions, reset) unchanged aside from swapping the sticker image source.
nonGoals: Do not add back the removed quiz side-photo layout or any additional quiz images beyond the corner sticker.
Do not change quiz copy, questions, answers, or result messages.
Do not implement any backend changes.

required: Cartoon teddy bear sticker illustration, cute style, transparent background (teddy-bear-sticker.dim_220x220.png)
